backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining restaurants, menu items, orders, profiles, seeded data, and authorization mixin setup.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module updating Pizza Palace image URLs by mapping old asset paths to new `.dim_512x512` variants.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing image-asset additions and frontend image-resolution updates with related files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing app structure, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, layout, identity handling, protected pages, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with add/remove/update, persistence, and single-restaurant enforcement.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items including menu and restaurant metadata.
Login/logout button using Internet Identity with React Query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Shows a login prompt when no identity is present; otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Renders an image that swaps to a fallback source on load error and resets when src changes.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides loading skeletons, error alerts, and empty state UI components for query results.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, cart indicator, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a modal for entering and saving a user's name via a profile setup form.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDetail.ts: Fetches order status and items for a given order ID using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Fetches the caller's orders, currently returning an empty list pending backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Provides a mutation to place an order and invalidates order queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurant.ts: Fetches a restaurant and its menu by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurants.ts: Fetches the list of all restaurants from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom theme variables, dark mode values, and global background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and order placement with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays order status and items with refresh and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersListPage.tsx: Lists the user's past orders with status, totals, and navigation to detail pages.
Shows restaurant details and menu items, enabling quantity selection and adding dishes to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantsListPage.t: Displays a grid of restaurants with images and navigation to individual restaurant pages.
frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts: Provides fallback image paths and mappings for known restaurants and dishes, plus normalization helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL params (query and hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the full-stack app architecture, recent image/data updates, known issues, and generated asset requirements.
